title: Couleur Café
subtitle: promotional sticker
description: A series of promotional stickers for Couleur Café, a music festival in Brussels. Each sticker displays one of the headlining artists, with a collage of elements that create an atmosphere that matches both the artist and the festival.

seo.title: Couleur Café
seo.description: A series of promotional stickers for Couleur Café.

title: Commander Spoon
subtitle: EP Branding
description: Branding for the Flock EP by Commander Spoon. This was a branding package including a new logo for the band, merchandise, single covers and of course the EP cover.
